The '''mountain edge''' or '''extreme hills edge''' was an edge variant of the [[Windswept Hills|windswept hills]] that generated before [[The Update that Changed the World]], and was removed in [[Java Edition 1.18]].

== Description ==
Before [[Java Edition 1.7.2]], all {{Abbr|extreme hills|now known as windswept hills}} used to generate a mountain edge surrounding the whole biome. Similarly to the [[sparse jungle]] biome, it was a technical biome intended to provide a smooth transition from other biomes to the mountains. It was nearly identical to the extreme hills biome, but with gentler slopes.

The mountain edge has never generated in ''Bedrock Edition'', but remains unused.
